bricker.brick_strategies - package bricker.brick_strategies
The 'bricker.brick_strategies' package contains a suite of collision strategy classes made for a brick's game.
bricker.gameobjects - package bricker.gameobjects
The 'bricker.gameobjects' package is an assemblage of classes that form the core interactive components of a brick-breaking game.
bricker.main - package bricker.main
The 'bricker.main' package is the operational core of the brick-breaking game, orchestrating its overall management and execution.
bricker.utils - package bricker.utils
Provides utility classes for the game.
BrickerGameManager - Class in bricker.main
Manages the overall game logic for a brick-breaking game.
BrickerGameManager(String, Vector2) - Constructor for class bricker.main.BrickerGameManager
Default constructor! Constructs a new BrickerGameManager with the specified window title and dimensions.
BrickerGameManager(String, Vector2, int, int) - Constructor for class bricker.main.BrickerGameManager
Non-default Constructor! Constructs a new BrickerGameManager with custom settings for the game window, rows, and columns.
